name: Save the Lost Divine Cave
description:
Game Story:

This game talks about that there's a mountain full of devil power where there are divine statues, and all of them have lost the light to expel the darkness. The main character is an adventurer and one day he came to this mountain and find this lost cave. You need to help the adventurer to light up all the lost divine statues and expel the darkness.

Goal:

To light up all the statues in the cave and prevent yourself from the horrible reincarnations of the devil!

Gameplay:

Use WASD to move and press Space to keep not letting the darkness devour the last hope.

The core mechanics is that you have to keep pressing the Space button--by saying that, I mean you have to show your APM! Do not hold the Space button but keep pressing it over and over again to "delay" the coming of devil power.

More tips can be found in the game. Good luck!
